metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:regkeyeffectiverights53_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:regkeyeffectiverights53_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive, key, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive, key, and trustee_sid pattern match is supported.
Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive pattern match, key, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.

regkeyeffectiverights53_test.comment: Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive, key, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive, key, and trustee_sid pattern match is supported.
Test that a regkeyeffectiverights53_object with a hive pattern match, key, and trustee_sid is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.
Test that the include_group behavior is supported.
Test that the resolve_group behavior is supported.

regkeyeffectiverights53_object.comment: This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid that matches the regular expression '^S-1-5-32-[0-9-]+'.
This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' key matching '^SOFTWARE\\Micros[oft]{3}\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion$' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.
This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive starting at 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', recursing down 1 level, and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive starting at 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', recursing down infinitely, and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive starting at 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', recursing up 1 level, and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon', and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion'. and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544' with include_group behavior set to false.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_object with hive equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', a key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion', and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544' with resolve_group behavior set to true.

regkeyeffectiverights53_state.comment: This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid that matches the regular expression '^S-1-5-32-[0-9-]+'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key matching '^SOFTWARE\\Micros[oft]{3}\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion$' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid equals 'S-1-5-32-544'.

This regkeyeffectiverights53_state represents a file which has a hive that equals 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equals 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' and trustee_sid not equal to 'S-1-5-32-544'.
